text: @HillaryClinton @WHO Get this right, USA is the biggest funder of WHO, & is being hit by the Covid19 worse than any other country in terms of the number of infections. WHO & China lied/withheld critical information that could have prepared the US. USA does not need the WHO. Comment with that in mind.
